name: Boar Hunting
description: Deliver 3 adult boar to sunveils butcher

name: Elk Hunting
description: Deliver 1 Giant Elk to Elkpoints butcher

name: Ruins Escort
description: Escort a group of 4 researchers to and from the Fortress Ruins (at least 3 adventurers required)

name: Giant Crabs
description: Deliver 6 Giant Crabs (alive) to the Singing Seagull in Cloudmoor

name: Gnoll Rescue
description: Rescue any surviving people from the Gnoll cave (3-4 adventurers recommended)

name: Merrow Raid
description: 2-3 adventurers needed to retrieve a large red orb from the Merrows lair

name: Centaur Meet
description: Escort a merchant to and from the centaurs fields

name: Stolen Blink Dog
description: Return Blink Dog puppy back to the guild. Both thieves seen wearing red cloaks with long blue hair
